short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you ever wanted to save inidividual files from a GitHub repository that piqued your interest, this extension is for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitHub Save is a web extension designed to enhance your GitHub experience by providing a seamless way to save individual repository files. Whether you're a developer or a researcher, GitHub Save helps you curate and organize essential files with ease.

With GitHub Save, saving specific files from a GitHub repository is a breeze. No more downloading entire repositories or searching through lengthy codebases—simply save the files you need with a few clicks.

GitHub Save seamlessly integrates into popular web browsers, ensuring compatibility across various platforms and operating systems. Whether you use Chrome or Firefox, GitHub Save is ready to optimize your GitHub

GitHub Save features a clean and user-friendly interface, making it accessible to users of all technical backgrounds. No complicated configurations or setups required—start saving files right away.

Upgrade your GitHub workflow today with GitHub Save and take control of saving and organizing your repository files. Simplify your GitHub experience, streamline your workflow, and make file management a breeze.
